rajasthan-retreat.title: Rajasthan Retreat
rajasthan-retreat.location: Udaipur, Mount Abu, Kumbhalgarh, Rajasthan, India
rajasthan-retreat.description: Explore the majestic lakes, serene hills, and imposing forts of Rajasthan with this curated 6-day journey covering Udaipur, Mount Abu, and Kumbhalgarh.
rajasthan-retreat.longDescription:
Rajasthan, the "Land of Kings," is a vibrant tapestry of royal heritage, majestic landscapes, and timeless traditions. Known for its golden deserts, grand palaces, and imposing forts, the state is a treasure trove for travelers seeking culture, history, and adventure.

Explore the iconic cities of Jaipur, Udaipur, Jodhpur, and Jaisalmer, each offering unique experiences, from opulent palaces to bustling bazaars. Witness the rich traditions of folk music and dance, marvel at intricately carved temples, or embark on a thrilling camel safari in the Thar Desert.

Rajasthan also boasts natural wonders, including the serene lakes of Udaipur, the rugged Aravalli Hills, and wildlife sanctuaries like Ranthambore. With its warm hospitality, colorful festivals, and rich culinary delights, Rajasthan promises an unforgettable journey into India's regal past.

Perfect for history buffs, nature lovers, and adventure seekers alike, Rajasthan is a destination that leaves every traveler enchanted.
includes: All transfers and sightseeing by Personalized AC Car
All Toll tax, parking fees & driver allowances
excludes: Entrance fees to monuments and museum
Other meals not mentioned laundry, telephone calls, and incidentals.
Any personal expenses. Room service and special orders. Alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.
Any expense arising due to unforeseen circumstances is not included.

activities: Arrival and hotel check-in
Visit City Palace
Boat ride on Lake Pichola
Leisure time at Bagore Ki Haveli

itineraryDays.title: Udaipur Sightseeing
activities: Visit Saheliyon Ki Bari and Jagdish Temple
Explore Fateh Sagar Lake and Vintage Car Museum
Visit local bazaars or sunset at Sajjangarh Palace

itineraryDays.title: Udaipur to Mount Abu
activities: Drive to Mount Abu
Hotel check-in and visit Dilwara Temples
Stroll along Nakki Lake and visit Sunset Point

itineraryDays.title: Mount Abu to Kumbhalgarh
activities: Drive to Kumbhalgarh
Check-in and visit Kumbhalgarh Fort

itineraryDays.title: Kumbhalgarh to Udaipur
activities: Drive to Udaipur via Ranakpur Jain Temple
Relax or explore Udaipur
Optional: Attend folk dance performance

itineraryDays.title: Departure from Udaipur
activities: Transfer to airport or railway station

heritage-trails.title: Heritage Trails of Rajasthan
heritage-trails.description: Journey through Rajasthan's royal cities—Jaipur, Jodhpur, and Jaisalmer—unveiling majestic forts, colorful bazaars, and golden deserts.
heritage-trails.longDescription:
Rajasthan, the "Land of Kings," is a vibrant tapestry of royal heritage, majestic landscapes, and timeless traditions. Known for its golden deserts, grand palaces, and imposing forts, the state is a treasure trove for travelers seeking culture, history, and adventure.

Explore the iconic cities of Jaipur, Udaipur, Jodhpur, and Jaisalmer, each offering unique experiences, from opulent palaces to bustling bazaars. Witness the rich traditions of folk music and dance, marvel at intricately carved temples, or embark on a thrilling camel safari in the Thar Desert.

Rajasthan also boasts natural wonders, including the serene lakes of Udaipur, the rugged Aravalli Hills, and wildlife sanctuaries like Ranthambore. With its warm hospitality, colorful festivals, and rich culinary delights, Rajasthan promises an unforgettable journey into India's regal past.

Perfect for history buffs, nature lovers, and adventure seekers alike, Rajasthan is a destination that leaves every traveler enchanted.

itineraryDays.title: Jaipur Sightseeing

jewel-of-india.title: The Jewel of India Rajasthan
jewel-of-india.description: Experience royal Rajasthan through its cultural gems—Jaipur, Udaipur, and the heroic Chittorgarh Fort—on this 6-day unforgettable journey.
jewel-of-india.longDescription: Ravishing Rajasthan - Relish the Retreat. Discover the royal grandeur of Jaipur, the romantic lakes of Udaipur, and the heroic legacy of Chittorgarh in this enriching 6-day journey across Rajasthan. From the iconic Hawa Mahal and Amber Fort to the scenic Lake Pichola and the imposing Chittorgarh Fort, this itinerary blends history, architecture, and cultural immersion, offering a holistic experience of India’s regal past.
includes: All transfers and sightseeing by Personalized AC Car
All Toll tax, parking fees & driver allowances
excludes: Special clothing and Winter-wear on rent
Entrance fees to monuments and museum

itineraryDays.title: Arrival in Jaipur – The Pink City
activities: Arrival and transfer to hotel
Visit City Palace and Jantar Mantar
Stroll through Johari Bazaar

itineraryDays.title: Jaipur Sightseeing – Royal Grandeur
activities: Visit Amber Fort with optional elephant or jeep ride
Photo stop at Jal Mahal
Explore Albert Hall Museum and Birla Mandir
Optional dinner with cultural show at Chokhi Dhani

itineraryDays.title: Jaipur to Udaipur – The City of Lakes
activities: Drive from Jaipur to Udaipur (~400 km, 7-8 hrs)
Optional stop at Pushkar to visit Brahma Temple and Pushkar Lake
Evening boat ride on Lake Pichola

itineraryDays.title: Udaipur Sightseeing – Romance and Royalty
activities: Visit City Palace and Saheliyon Ki Bari
Explore Bagore Ki Haveli and Jagdish Temple
Optional cultural dance performance at Bagore Ki Haveli

itineraryDays.title: Udaipur to Chittorgarh – The Land of Valor
activities: Drive to Chittorgarh (~120 km, 2.5 hrs one way)
Explore Chittorgarh Fort, Vijay Stambh, Rani Padmini’s Palace, and Kirti Stambh
Return to Udaipur in evening

itineraryDays.title: Departure from Udaipur
activities: Leisure time for shopping or stroll
Transfer to Udaipur Airport or Railway Station

golden-sands.title: Golden Sands & Royal Palaces
golden-sands.location: Jaipur, Jodhpur, Jaisalmer, Udaipur, Rajasthan, India
golden-sands.description: Discover the regal cities of Rajasthan with this 9-day journey, exploring deserts, palaces, lakes, and vibrant culture from Jaipur to Udaipur.
golden-sands.longDescription:
Rajasthan, the "Land of Kings," is a vibrant tapestry of royal heritage, majestic landscapes, and timeless traditions. Known for its golden deserts, grand palaces, and imposing forts, the state is a treasure trove for travelers seeking culture, history, and adventure.

Explore the iconic cities of Jaipur, Udaipur, Jodhpur, and Jaisalmer, each offering unique experiences, from opulent palaces to bustling bazaars. Witness the rich traditions of folk music and dance, marvel at intricately carved temples, or embark on a thrilling camel safari in the Thar Desert.

Rajasthan also boasts natural wonders, including the serene lakes of Udaipur, the rugged Aravalli Hills, and wildlife sanctuaries like Ranthambore. With its warm hospitality, colorful festivals, and rich culinary delights, Rajasthan promises an unforgettable journey into India's regal past.

Perfect for history buffs, nature lovers, and adventure seekers alike, Rajasthan is a destination that leaves every traveler enchanted.
